Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/37th
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temp rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California: due to, street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th, California and over regular route: due to, street blockage near California/37th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays at Monroe due to unauthorized person on tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays at Monroe due to unauthorized person on tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State

#20 Madison

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
